name: Ludum Dare 39 Submission - Legend of Sunflower
name_original: Ludum Dare 39 Submission - Legend of Sunflower
description:
Legend of Sunflower - LD#39 Entry (Running out of power)

The Objective is to stay a couple of seconds on top of this:

Press A,W,D,S or use the arrows to move.

Legend of Sunflower is a game about a sunflower that needs water to survive, and that is faster at daytime and slower at night.

# This version is for the Ludum Dare Compo #

Build being updated after Ludum Dare: https://johnnydalvi.itch.io/legend-sunflower-new-build

GitHub: https://github.com/JohnnyDalvi/LudumDare39
